name: berry-juice
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A 100% pure juice. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 20 points.
